name: chat-assistant
description: 🎯 Chat Assistant - Das Schweizer Taschenmesser für Chat-Moderatoren. Universelles KI-Tool mit eigenem Google Gemini API-Key.

scripts.dev: echo '🚀 Development Mode: Load extension in Chrome://extensions/' && echo 'Enable Developer Mode → Load Unpacked → Select this folder'
scripts.test: echo '🧪 Running Quality Checks...' && npm run validate-json && npm run check-syntax && npm run security-check
scripts.validate-json: echo '📋 Validating JSON...' && node -e "require('./manifest.json'); console.log('✅ manifest.json valid')"
scripts.check-syntax: echo '🔍 Checking JavaScript syntax...' && find . -name '*.js' -exec node -c {} \;
scripts.security-check: echo '🛡️ Security check...' && ! grep -r 'AIzaSy[A-Za-z0-9_-]\{35\}' --include='*.js' . || (echo '❌ Hardcoded API key found!' && exit 1)
scripts.lint: echo '📝 ESLint check...' && npx eslint . || echo '⚠️ ESLint not installed - run: npm install -g eslint'
scripts.typecheck: echo '🔍 TypeScript check...' && npx tsc --noEmit || echo '⚠️ TypeScript not installed - run: npm install -g typescript'
scripts.build: echo '📦 Building production package...' && npm run test && echo '✅ Ready for Chrome Web Store'
scripts.package: echo '🏪 Creating Chrome Web Store package...' && zip -r chat-assistant-v2.0.0.zip . -x '*.git*' 'node_modules/*' '*.log' '.env*'
